Transformers Revenge Of The Fallen http://www.thevideo.me/6dvdb7x5o9j7 http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/cb/TF2SteelPoster.jpg/220px-TF2SteelPoster.jpg http://www.craveonline.com/images/stories/2011/2012/June/Film/Transformers_Dark_of_the_Moon_Optimus_Prime.jpg Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
Transformers: Dark of the Moon http://www.uploadc.com/84o2mo55wvg9 http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/bf/Transformers_dark_of_the_moon_ver5.jpg/220px-Transformers_dark_of_the_moon_ver5.jpg https://andygaudion93.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/transformers-dark-of-the-moon-2011-movie-image.jpg The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
Transformers: Age of Extinction http://www.nowvideo.sx/video/e411db3aba507 http://cdn1.sciencefiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Transformers-Age-of-Extinction-Poster-Optimus-and-Grimlock.jpg http://cdn.screenrant.com/wp-content/uploads/Bumblebee-Transformers-Age-of-Extinction.jpg Autobots must escape sight from a bounty hunter who takes control of the human serendipity: Unexpectedly, Optimus Prime and his remaining gang turn to a mechanic and his daughter for help.
